contents.text: Thank you for calling Reforge in San Francisco, where experienced professionals accelerate their growth in marketing, product, data, and engineering.
To learn about our growth programs, press 1.
For marketing and product programs, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a program advisor for marketing and product.

navigationGoals: I need to learn about upcoming marketing & product program start dates, curriculum, and pricing to plan my schedule.
I need details on the marketing & product growth program—curriculum, schedule, and any veteran discounts available.
Explore analytics integration and framework modules in the marketing and product growth program.
I’m an older learner and need help understanding your marketing and product growth programs
Discuss how the marketing & product curriculum can help me transition from physics research to product management

contents.text: For data and engineering programs, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a program advisor for data and engineering.

navigationGoals: I want details on the data and engineering growth track—prerequisites, timeline, and cost.
I’d like information on the data & engineering growth program—prerequisites, timeline, and whether my military experience counts toward admission.
Explore ML pipeline, data architecture, and deployment topics in the data and engineering program.
I’m not tech-savvy and would like someone to explain your data and engineering courses
Learn about the data & engineering track for someone with a physics background moving into data science

contents.text: For admissions and enrollment support, press 2.
To speak with our admissions team, press 1.
One moment please while we connect you to an admissions specialist.

navigationGoals: I’d like to check my application status and confirm next steps to complete enrollment efficiently.
I want to check admissions requirements and deadlines, and see if my military background can fulfill any prerequisites.
Clarify application deadlines, prerequisites, and admission criteria for Reforge cohorts.
I need step-by-step assistance completing my enrollment application
Clarify application prerequisites and deadlines for the next cohort

contents.text: To contact our support team for general inquiries, press 2.
One moment please while we connect you to our support team.

navigationGoals: I need to fix an issue accessing the online portal—my course materials aren’t loading, and I need assistance.
I have a general question about using my GI Bill benefits and veteran scholarships at Reforge.
Troubleshoot SAML SSO login and API authentication issues in the Reforge portal.
I have a general question about my account and need some support
Get assistance resetting my account login and resolving a billing query
